item.title: In the past 24 hours, the entire network has seen $348 million in liquidations, with both longs and shorts getting rekt.
item.description: On September 6th, according to Coinglass data, a total of $348 million has been liquidated on the entire network in the past 24 hours. The total amount of long liquidations is $208 million, and the total amount of short liquidations is $140 million.

item.title: Ethereum PoS Network Exit Queue has decreased to around 789,000 ETH, while the Join Queue has increased to around 936,000 ETH.
item.description: On September 6th, based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website "validatorqueue", it is reported that the current exit queue of the Ethereum PoS network is 789,101 ETH. Calculated at the current price, approximately $33.9 billion worth of ETH is exiting the PoS network, and the withdrawal delay is currently reported to be 13 days and 17 hours.Meanwhile, the demand for staking by new validators has increased. Today, the admission queue has risen to 936,769 ETH, which is worth around $40.25 billion. The current waiting time in the admission queue is 16 days and 6 hours.

item.title: Marinade announces that 300 million MNDE have been permanently burned, worth approximately $40 million
item.description: On September 6th, according to official channels, the Solana liquidity protocol Marinade announced that 3 billion MNDE tokens (accounting for 30% of the total supply, approximately equivalent to $40 million) have been permanently destroyed.

item.title: Trump's Son Reveals New Book "Under Siege," Set to Be Published on October 14
item.description: On September 6th, Eric Trump, the son of former President Donald Trump, put up a sales link to his new book "Under Siege" on social media. According to the official website, the book is scheduled to be published on October 14th and will consist of 288 pages.In this memoir, Eric Trump relates the remarkable and gripping moments he has encountered in his life and career as a member of America's most influential family. Starting from his earliest recollections of growing up in the Trump family to playing a crucial role in the 2016 and 2024 presidential elections, leading the strategic counterattack in the "legal battle," and managing the Trump Organization, Eric has been actively involved in every facet of the family's heritage.

item.title: A whale deposited 5 million USDC into Hyperliquid, opened a 3x leverage position, and went long on HYPE.
item.description: On September 5th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale deposited 5 million USDC into Hyperliquid and initiated a 3x leveraged long position on HYPE. Furthermore, the whale has set multiple limit buy orders for HYPE and WLFI, with the intention of further expanding their position.

item.title: Spot Gold Surges Above $3600 Per Ounce, Reaching a New All-Time High
item.description: On September 6, spot gold exceeded $3600/oz for the first time and reached a record high. The intraday increase expanded to 1.5%, and the year-to-date cumulative increase exceeded $970. (Oriental Wealth)

item.title: Bitwise Avalanche ETF has been registered in Delaware
item.description: On September 6th, based on market information, the Bitwise Avalanche ETF has been registered in Delaware, the United States.

item.title: SharpLink: ETH Purchase via ATM Plan Does Not Require Shareholder Additional Approval
item.description: On September 6th, according to official channels, SharpLink declared that it is in full compliance with Nasdaq regulations. In the event that it decides to implement an ATM plan to purchase ETH, no additional approval from shareholders is necessary. The fundraising strategy remains unchanged and will only be carried out in a manner that is beneficial to shareholders.In response to recent media reports regarding some digital asset treasury companies issuing new shares to purchase cryptocurrency and requiring shareholder approval, SharpLink clarified that such regulations do not apply to the company. It will continue to strictly abide by Nasdaq regulations and industry best practices to ensure compliant and transparent transactions.

item.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary: For the stability of the U.S. economy, the Federal Reserve must re-establish its credibility as an independent institution
item.description: On September 5th, as reported by The Wall Street Journal, U.S. Treasury Secretary Yellen said that to safeguard the future and stability of the U.S. economy, the Federal Reserve must restore its credibility as an independent institution. There needs to be an honest, independent, and non-partisan review of the entire institution, encompassing monetary policy, regulation, communication, personnel, and research. Moving forward, the Federal Reserve must reduce its impact on distorting the economy.

item.title: WLFI blacklisted 272 addresses in the past week
item.description: On September 5th, Galaxy researcher Zack announced on social media that in the previous week, WLFI had blacklisted 272 addresses. On-chain records indicate that some of these addresses were involved in a bulk blacklisting operation.
